tests.name: Multiple inverted sections per template should be permitted.
Missing key should trigger the inverted section rendering.
Null should trigger the inverted section rendering.
False should trigger the inverted section rendering.
Empty string should trigger the inverted section rendering.
Empty list should trigger the inverted section rendering.
Zero should trigger the inverted section rendering.
True should trigger the inverted section omission.
Object should trigger the inverted section omission.
Non-empty string should trigger the inverted section omission.
Non-empty blank string should trigger the inverted section omission.
Non-empty list should trigger the inverted section omission.
List made of an empty list should trigger the section omission.
Missing key should trigger the inverted section rendering, and the omission of the 'else' section.
Null should trigger the inverted section rendering, and the omission of the 'else' section.
False should trigger the inverted section rendering, and the omission of the 'else' section.
Empty string should trigger the inverted section rendering, and the omission of the 'else' section.
Empty list should trigger the inverted section rendering, and the omission of the 'else' section.
Zero should trigger the inverted section rendering, and the omission of the 'else' section.
True should trigger the inverted section omission, and the rendering of the 'else' section.
Object should trigger the inverted section omission, and the rendering of the 'else' section.
Non-empty string should trigger the inverted section omission, and the rendering of the 'else' section.
Non-empty blank string should trigger the inverted section omission, and the rendering of the 'else' section.
Non-empty list should trigger the inverted section omission, and the rendering of the 'else' section.
List made of an empty list should trigger the section omission, and the rendering of the 'else' section.
Closing tag may be empty.
Closing tag may be blank.
Closing tag after 'else' tag may be empty.
Closing tag after 'else' tag may be blank.
'Else' tag may be empty.
'Else' tag may be blank.
Both 'else' and closing tags may be empty.
Both 'else' and closing tags may be blank.
Empty 'else' and closing tags can be nested.
Whitespace in tag should be ignored.
Single left outer whitespace should be honored when inverted section is rendered.
Single right outer whitespace should be honored when inverted section is rendered.
Single left inner whitespace should be honored when inverted section is rendered.
Single right inner whitespace should be honored when inverted section is rendered.
Single left outer whitespace should be honored when inverted section is omitted.
Single right outer whitespace should be honored when inverted section is omitted.
